On Mon, 01 Nov 2004 14:12:07 +0000, Colin Green <cgreen@...> wrote:
> [Activation functions]
> ----------------------
> Linear
> Inverse Linear
> Sigmoid

ANJI also includes a hyperbolic tangent (tanh) activation, and we've
gotten some good results using this.

Derek
